scripts.copy:images: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(fs.existsSync('src/images')){fs.mkdirSync('dist/images', {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync('src/images').forEach(file => fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src/images', file), path.join('dist/images', file)))}"
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/css', {recursive: true})" && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/js', {recursive: true})"
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:sass && npm run build:ts && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:data && npm run copy:images
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel watch:sass watch:ts
